Instructions

Study

Complete these tasks in order:

  • Read ch.1.1-1.2–please purchase the book in the bookstore or online by next week.
  • Read ‘The Trial and Death of Socrates’, Plato, pp.44-53
  • Study these notes.
  • Watch this short clip

Assignments

  • Complete essay 1 by Monday @ 11:59pm. You will find this in the folder for Week 1 in Blackboard. Submit the essay through Blackboard. Please use ‘attach file’ to upload the file. Do not use ‘write submission’ or send it as a message.
